medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one day after returning from a month-long trip, with acute pain in the RLQ. The patient had been feeling intermittently sick to her stomach over the last week with some crampy abdominal pain. No prior experience of such pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history: none; Past surgical history: tonsillectomy, IUD placement.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diabetes mellitus; maternal grandmother with lung cancer; maternal grandfather with colon cancer.
